problem_statement: Solo recruiters in small and mid-sized companies are overwhelmed by hundreds of résumés per role. Manual screening leads to decision fatigue, missed talent and slow time‑to‑hire.

target_users.name: Sarah
pain_points: Receives 300+ résumés per week for engineering roles
Spends hours manually scanning for keyword matches
Loses qualified candidates due to delayed responses
Needs to communicate decisions promptly while maintaining a positive candidate experience

features: Smart parsing of job descriptions and résumés using NLP and TF‑IDF/embeddings
Fit scoring on a 0–100 scale with threshold‑based recommendations (Interview/Reject)
Concise résumé summary highlighting relevant skills and experience
Agentic integration with n8n to trigger calendar invites and send templated emails
Admin dashboard for adjusting scoring thresholds and monitoring metrics
user_flow: Recruiter logs into RecruitAI and opens the screening interface.
She pastes or uploads a job description and a candidate résumé.
The system analyzes both texts, computes a similarity score and generates a short summary.
Based on the score, RecruitAI recommends ‘Interview’ or ‘Reject’.
If ‘Interview’ is chosen, the agent triggers an n8n workflow to schedule a meeting and send an invitation email.  If ‘Reject’, it sends a polite decline email.
All results are logged for analytics and continuous improvement.

core_modules.frontend_ui: A lightweight web interface (HTML/JS/CSS) where recruiters input JDs and résumés and view scores, summaries and recommendations.
core_modules.scoring_engine: A Python backend that tokenizes text, removes stopwords and computes TF‑IDF/cosine similarity.  Pluggable to support embeddings.
core_modules.agentic_layer: A set of n8n workflows that call the scoring API, branch based on thresholds and integrate with calendar and email services.
core_modules.data_store: A simple database or Google Sheet to log scores, decisions and metadata for reporting and model tuning.

tiers.name: Starter
tiers.features: Unlimited screening and up to 5 users

tiers.name: Pro
tiers.features: Team dashboard, analytics, and n8n integration

case_study_example.problem: Recruiting team spent 20 hours per week reviewing résumés for software engineer roles.
case_study_example.solution: Implemented RecruitAI to automate screening and scheduling.
case_study_example.impact: Reduced screening time by 60%, increased candidate response rate by 30%, and cut time‑to‑hire from 45 to 28 days.
